The Sunday Starter

For those who can't wait ‘til Monday.

Introduction - 4-3-2022

If you’re watching this on Sunday, we already have something in common:  We like getting a jump on the week.

I’m Louie Bernstein and I want to thank you for taking time out of your day to watch this inaugural edition of the Sunday Starter.

I plan to keep these video newsletters to three minutes or less.  But since this is the first edition, it will be just a bit longer, because I’d like to give you a little bac

I was into the seventh month of the sale cycle when I found myself one day unable to move, sitting in my car in the office parking lot and thinking:

- I’m not sure I’m going to get this deal closed.

- If I don’t win this deal, I may get fired.

- If I lose, my reputation will be badly damaged, and I may not get another job.

- Plus, I won’t get promoted.

- Maybe I should just quit now.

To add to the pressure, I had just bought my first house and our first child was on the way.  What would th

So that’s what this first Sunday Starter is about.  It’s about not only staying in the game but excelling at it.

The Sunday Starter is about YOU.  And how you can excel at the business game, no matter where you are right now on your journey.  We all start at a different place.   Regardless, the key is to start.

I believe the mind is what separates really successful business people (or salespeople), from those who don’t reach their full potential.

This is what I call, The Iceberg Effect.

You
